content.text: Doing great! Excited to start my first day of school tomorrow!
Oh that's awesome! What are you studying?
Computer engineering. I've always loved computers and coding.
That's great! I'm a software engineer myself.
Oh cool! What kind of software do you work on?
Mostly web apps. I also do some mobile development.
That's awesome. Do you enjoy your job?
Yeah, I love it. It's really challenging and rewarding.
That's great to hear! I'm sure I'll enjoy my job as well.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
